Sentencas: Cerium oxide is a promising material for electrodes and electrolytes of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte

Sentencas: Lowering the sintering temperature of the electrolyte will bring a lot of benefits to the fabrication of SOFCs.
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte

Sentencas: This paper evaluates the feasibility of using lithium oxide as a sintering aid to reduce the densification temperature of samarium-doped ceria (Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9, SDC) by SEM and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte

Sentencas: It is shown that the addition of Li2CO3 can indeed decrease the sintering temperature of SDC.
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte

Sentencas: More attention is paid to understand the aiding mechanism of Li2CO3.
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy and thermal analysis indicate that it is Li2O, a decomposition product of Li2CO3, that facilitates the sintering by way of a liquid phase sintering effect on the grain boundaries of SDC.
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte

Sentencas: These findings help to promote the application of ceria-based electrolytes for intermediate temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Feasibility and mechanism of lithium oxide as sintering aid for Ce0.8Sm0.2Oδ electrolyte
